title: Ivern music at beginning of game
body:
So, I like to think of myself as an {{champion:427}} main. Being in Bronze VI means that I can't really play him that much (or that well...), but in Normals good god do I love to play him.

However, upon loading a game, I noticed that sometimes different music plays than the typical summoners rift theme. Instead of the normal music, music resembling Ivern's Login Theme plays instead. It only happens occasionally, only at the very start (0:00-1:40ish), and it only happens when I play Ivern.

My question is twofold: is this an actual thing, or am I hallucinating? And if it is an actual thing, where can I find it so I can listen to it more than once every 15-65 minutes?

I really love Ivern's theme, being my favourite Login theme in the game next to Taliyah's. The little easter egg of Ivern-style music at the beginning of games is almost sure to bring a smile to my face (that's sure to get wiped off soon enough).

TL;DR: When playing Ivern sometimes different music plays at the very beginning instead of the summoner's rift theme. Is this an actual thing or am I having a stroke.

In case you couldn't tell I'm bad at queries. Thanks!!
